Pre-Game Insights: The Utah Jazz host the Memphis Grizzlies for the season opener.
Utah went 31-51 overall, 16-36 in Western Conference play and 21-20 at home during the 2023-24 season.
The Jazz allowed opponents to score 120.5 points per game and shoot 48.7% from the field last season.
Memphis finished 27-55 overall and 14-37 in Western Conference games during the 2023-24 season.
The Grizzlies averaged 105.8 points per game while allowing opponents to score 112.8 last season.
Injuries for the Jazz include Isaiah Collier who is day to day with a hamstring injury.

Injuries for the Grizzlies include Jaren Jackson Jr. (day to day with a hamstring injury), Luke Kennard (day to day with a foot injury), Vince Williams Jr. (out with a leg injury), and GG Jackson II (out with a foot injury).
